HINT_OBJECT - Static variable in class com.purplehillsbooks.json.Dom2JSON
HINT_OBJECT (2) means it is an object even if no attributes or sub-elements appear, still always treat this as an object and return an object whether empty or not.
HINT_OBJECT_ARRAY - Static variable in class com.purplehillsbooks.json.Dom2JSON
HINT_OBJECT_ARRAY (3) means that this can can appear multiple times in the context, and that each time it is expected to have something complicated in it, so assocait the name with an array, and put the contents into object in that array.
HINT_SIMPLE - Static variable in class com.purplehillsbooks.json.Dom2JSON
HINT_SIMPLE (0) means it is a simple value, just take whatever string is found in the XML, and associate it with the attribute name as a string.
HINT_SIMPLE_ARRAY - Static variable in class com.purplehillsbooks.json.Dom2JSON
HINT_SIMPLE_ARRAY (1) means this element will appear multiple times in the current context and make an array of simple values, that is, and associate this name with an array that is then filled with simple string values Used in the hint hashtable parameter of convertDomToJSON and convertElementToJSON.
